channel.title: Need some help >>>click here if you want to help me!<<<
channel.description:
I need help, how to make Dark Bow ranged it does shoot twice, but yoju can only attack next to an npc and you dont need arrows so i think its just kinda melee.... please help me, thanks 26593
PS how can i fix my crystal bow wich shoots like 1 arrow every second but only 1 in 5 secs hit... how can i fix???
